summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 45, T. Hanford's Addition to South Seattle, being the alley between 14th Avenue South and 15th Avenue South from Hanford Street to Winthrop Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17274 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
